extension.name: uk.co.compucorp.membershipextras
extension.description: This extension includes a huge amount of untility features that completes CiviCRM's membership management process. Notebly membership payment in instalments, payment plan management and more.
extension.comments: Supported CiviCRM versions : - A patched version of CiviCRM 5.51.3, which can be found here: https://github.com/compucorp/civicrm-core/releases
